subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Coach Bill Belichick spoke publicly for the first time about the Aaron Hernandez murder case, expressing sympathy for Odin Lloyd’s family and saying the allegations had come as a shock.
snippet: Coach Bill Belichick spoke publicly for the first time about the Aaron Hernandez murder case, expressing sympathy for Odin Lloyd’s family and saying the allegations had come as a shock.
